single_full_anon.comment: A single, unthrottled, non-geotargeted campaign, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

untargeted_project.comment: Not the project targeted by the campaign

untargeted_language.comment: Not the language targeted by the campaign

untargeted_device.comment: User is on a device for which the campaign has no banners

untargeted_because_logged_in.comment: User is logged in, and the campaign has no banners for logged-in users

single_full_logged_in.comment: A single, unthrottled, non-geotargeted campaign, with a banner for logged-in users on one device

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

untargeted_because_anon.comment: User is anonymous, and the campaign has no banners for anonymous users

single_full_anon_and_logged_in.comment: A single, unthrottled, non-geotargeted campaign, with a banner for anonymous and logged-in users on one device

as_targeted_anon.comment: Context targeted by the campaign, anonymous user (country shouldn't matter)

as_targeted_logged_in.comment: Context targeted by the campaign, logged-in user (country shouldn't matter)

single_full_anon_geo.comment: A single, unthrottled, geotargeted campaign, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

untargeted_country.comment: User isn't in the targeted country

not_enabled.comment: A campaign that's not enabled, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

as_almost_targeted.comment: Campaign not available even though this is the context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

archived.comment: An archived campaign, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

as_almost_targeted.comment: Campaign not available even though this is the context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

ended.comment: A campaign that already ended, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

as_almost_targeted.comment: Campaign not available even though this is the context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

not_started.comment: A campaign that hasn't started yet, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

as_almost_targeted.comment: Campaign not available even though this is the context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

buckets.comment: A single, unthrottled, non-geotargeted campaign, with different banners for each bucket, for anonymous users on one device

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

multiple_partially_overlapping_geo.comment: Multiple partially overlapping campaigns producing different allocations for different regions

multiple_partially_overlapping_geo_and_n.comment: Multiple partially overlapping campaigns, including geo- and non-geo-targeted, producing different allocations for different regions

targeted_by_2_and_non_geo.comment: Country targeted by two geotargeted campaigns and one non-geotargeted campaign

targeted_by_1_and_non_geo.comment: Country targeted by one geotargeted campaign and one non-geotargeted campaign

targeted_by_non_geo.comment: Country targeted only by non-geotargeted campaign

multiple_partially_overlapping_heterogen.comment: Multiple partially overlapping campaigns on a diversity of taregeting criteria

two_priorities_unthrottled.comment: Two unthrottled campaigns of different priorities; the higher priority eclipses the lower one

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)
Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

two_priorities_throttled_leaving_space.comment: Two throttled campaigns of different priorities; both leave space.

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

two_priorities_throttled_no_space.comment: Two throttled campaigns of different priorities; no space is left over.

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

throttled_and_not_throttled_same_priorit.comment: Two campaigns, one of them throttled, at the same priority

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

multiple_throttled_and_not_throttled_dif.comment: Four campaigns at two priorities, all throttled except one at the lower priority

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

multiple_banners_same_weights.comment: A single campaign with two banners of the same weight

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

multiple_banners_different_weights.comment: A single campaign with two banners of the different weights

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

priority_throttling_and_weights.comment: Two throttled campaigns of differnt priorities, each with two banners of the different weights

as_targeted.comment: Context targeted by the campaign (country shouldn't matter)

single_anon_geo_region.comment: A single, unthrottled, geotargeted by region campaign, with a banner for anonymous users on one device

untargeted_region.comment: User isn't in the targeted region
